modName: NEW HD textures for INTERFACE and sounds
summary: New textures for the interface ...And new sounds...
descriptionHtml:
Hi All :)

HD series for SKYRIM ...
See how it looks galaxy!
See how they look skill tree!
See how they look icons skills!
Listen to sounds when scrolling skill tree!

New beautifoul symbols show up. 
The modification increases the texture resolution skills interfaces, and adds better sharpness.
Significantly modified the textures - so that galaxies were darker and clearer skill tree.
All three galaxies have been very sharp.
Photos background as a Warrior, Mage, thief - were sharp and balance colour changed and improved sharpness.
Lines of trees and the stars were substantially remodeled and colored.

Were added new sound effects for the player interface (known from my mod for the music and sounds)

IMPORTANT - The modification does not interfere with perks (only visual appearance)
The modification is compatible with all modifications trees perks :)

p.s.
If you like my modification, please vote for me;)

MY OTHER MODS
